alert.note: Alert for Marion (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:33PM EDT until May 18 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR MARION AND NORTHEASTERN TAYLOR COUNTIES... At 532 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located southwest of Lebanon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Marion and northeastern Taylor Counties, including the following locations... Saint Joseph, Belltown, Jessietown, Poplar Corner, Merrimac, Calvary, Bradfordsville, Greenbriar, Gravel Switch and Willowtown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
